page.title: 15Ardross: local government
page.content: A two tier local government structure operates in the area with the local councillor, who happens to represent the area on both District and Regional councils, living within the area covered by this block. The Regional Council , covering the whole Highland Region, operates from its administrative base in Inverness. The District Council has its base in the town of Dingwall, about 8 miles away. The local councillor's family were the owners of the castle until its sale in 1977. The family still play a very active part in the life of the community and a great deal of support was given during the compilation of this report by the local councillor.
